Validations

above accepted after afterOffsetOf alpha alphaNumeric array before beforeOffsetOf boolean confirmed date dateFormat different email endsWith equals in inList includes integer ip ipv4 ipv6 json max min notEquals notIn notInList number object range regex required requiredIf requiredWhen requiredWithAll requiredWithAny requiredWithoutAll requiredWithoutAny same startsWith string under url

Sanitizations

escape normalizeEmail plural singular slug stripLinks stripTags toBoolean toDate toInt toNull trim

above

Makes sure the value provided by the end user is above the expected value. This method will wrap both the values inside the Number function.

const rules = {
  age: 'above:20'
}

// or
const rules = {
  age: [
    rule('above', 20)
  ]
}

For customized build, you can import this rule as follows.

import { above } from 'indicative/builds/validations'
